snippet: Even before Hurricane Sandy passed, New York Road Runners had grappled with the question of how to proceed with the race, given the resources it would require.
abstract: New York Road Runners officials grappled with question of how to proceed with New York City Marathon, even before Hurricane Sandy passed, given the resources the race would require.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON and DAVID W. CHEN

lead_paragraph: Even before Hurricane Sandy passed, New York Road Runners had grappled with the question of how to proceed with the race, given the resources it would require.

headline.seo: New York Marathon Took Uneasy Route to Cancellation
headline.main: Marathon Stumbled Along a Route of Indecision on Its Way Toward Cancellation
headline.print_headline: Marathon Stumbled Along a Route of Indecision on Its Way Toward Cancellation
